author: Unreal Engine
description:
Learn more about the potential of materials in UEFN, crafting lightweight dynamic effects that can replace complex Verse scripts and sequencer animations. In this session, Jackson Clayton of Barnyard Games explains how leveraging techniques in the material graph can revolutionize your approach to visual design, and achieve stunning results with minimal performance impact. 

Whether you're making immersive environments or adding subtle interactive elements, the session provides practical examples and actionable insights for developers of all skill levels. Learn about how you can push the boundaries of what's possible with UEFN materials without compromising on creativity.
title: Material Mastery: Efficient Techniques for UEFN Effects | Unreal Fest Orlando 2025
